entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 7:52 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of wet flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of wet flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
